Introduction
This topic contains information on developing for accrued benefits, including
language to use when denying the request to substitute
discussion of findings when denying the request to substitute
right to appeal the request to substitute decision
, and
language to use when
granting the request to substitute
, and
when granting substitution and an HLR was pending
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C  - Development for Accrued and Requests for Substitution
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C
